### Synopsis

<!-- AUTOGENERATED USAGE DESCRIPTIONS -->

Note: This command is deprecated in future versions of npm 9.0.0 and above. Please read the [release notes](https://github.blog/changelog/2022-10-24-npm-v9-0-0-released/), which include that `npx command` is a replacement for `$(npm bin)/command` (as of npm v5)

Note: This command is unaware of workspaces.

### Description

Print the folder where npm will install executables.
